title: Real Fake
overview: Real Fake is a romantic – comedy - action series about "Gob" a young tourist police who becomes famous in social as a representative of TAT, tries to chase the counterfeit gangster which runs by "Real" a charming, witty girl from orphaned home. One day, she finds a mysterious bag contains millions of US cash that leads her to become involved in a counterfeit money trade. Will "Gob" help "Real" for real or just to impress the social fake life? Who's real and who's fake? This could end up with love or loss, one way or another.
